Class ZoomSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.zoom.sdk.ZoomSDK

extends java.lang.Object
    ZOOM SDK global manager.

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret,
                                    ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize ZOOM SDK.

        Deprecated, use initialize(Context, ZoomSDKInitializeListener, ZoomSDKInitParams) instead.

        Parameters:
        context - Android context.
        appKey - APP Key got from zoom.us.
        appSecret - APP secret got from zoom.us.
        listener - Listener for the initialization result.

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret,
                                    boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                                    ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize ZOOM SDK. Deprecated, use initialize(Context, ZoomSDKInitializeListener, ZoomSDKInitParams) instead.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - APP Key got from zoom.us.
        appSecret - APP secret got from zoom.us.
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is TRUE, ZOOM SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically.
        listener - Listener for the result of initialization.

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret,
                                    java.lang.String domain,
                                    boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                                    ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize ZOOM SDK. Deprecated, use initialize(Context, ZoomSDKInitializeListener, ZoomSDKInitParams) instead.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - APP Key got from zoom.us.
        appSecret - APP secret got from zoom.us.
        domain - ZOOM domain name. Default value: zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is TRUE, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically. Otherwise user needs to call verifyApp manually once initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for the result of initialization.

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret,
                                    java.lang.String domain,
                                    boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                                    ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener,
                                    boolean enableLog)
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize ZOOM SDK. Deprecated, use initialize(Context, ZoomSDKInitializeListener, ZoomSDKInitParams) instead.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - APP Key got from zoom.us.
        appSecret - APP secret got from zoom.us.
        domain - ZOOM domain name. Default value: zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is TRUE, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically. Otherwise user needs to call verifyApp manually once initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialization result.
        enableLog - Enable/Disable the default debug log.

      • initialize

        @Deprecated
public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String appKey,
                                    java.lang.String appSecret,
                                    java.lang.String domain,
                                    boolean autoRetryVerifyApp,
                                    ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener,
                                    boolean enableLog,
                                    int logSize)
        Deprecated. 
        Initialize ZOOM SDK. Deprecated, use initialize(Context, ZoomSDKInitializeListener, ZoomSDKInitParams) instead.
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        appKey - APP Key got from zoom.us.
        appSecret - APP secret got from zoom.us.
        domain - ZOOM domain name. Default value: zoom.us
        autoRetryVerifyApp - If it is TRUE, Zoom SDK will retry to call verifyApp automatically. Otherwise user needs to call verifyApp manually once initialize failed.
        listener - Listener for initialization result.
        enableLog - Enable/Disable the default debug log.
        logSize - Log File Size. 1-50M

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                       ZoomSDKInitializeListener listener,
                       ZoomSDKInitParams params)
        Parameters:
        context - Android context
        listener - Listener for initialization result.
        params - initparams ZoomSDKInitParams. you can use jwtToken or (appKey and appSecret) to initialize

        Parameters:

        force - true:force switch
        Returns:

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()

        Returns:
        TRUE means initialized. Otherwise not.

      • loginWithZoom

        public int loginWithZoom(java.lang.String email,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Login ZOOM SDK with working email. *Note* This function is optional, ignore it if you do not have the account of working email in ZOOM.
        Parameters:
        email - The email to login.
        password - Login password.
        Returns:
        result Error code defined in ZoomApiError.

      • loginWithSSOToken

        public int loginWithSSOToken(java.lang.String ssoToken)
        Login ZOOM SDK with SSO token.
        Parameters:
        ssoToken - SSO token.
        Returns:
        Error code defined in ZoomApiError.

      • logoutZoom

        public boolean logoutZoom()
        Logout ZOOM SDK. *Note* This function is optional, ignore it if you do not have the account of working email/SSO in ZOOM.
        Returns:
        TRUE means that the user can logout. Otherwise not.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Query if ZOOM user has logged in. *Note* This function is optional, ignore it if you do not have the account of working email in ZOOM.
        Returns:
        TRUE means that the user has logged in. Otherwise not.

      • tryAutoLoginZoom

        public int tryAutoLoginZoom()
        Login ZOOM SDK automatically with local ZOOM/SSO token once you have logged in successfully. *Note* This function is optional, ignore it if you do not have the account of working email/SSO account in ZOOM.
        Returns:
        Login ZOOM successfully or not. See ZoomApiError.

        Parameters:
        domain - Domain name to be set. Default value: zoom.us.

      • setDropBoxAppKeyPair

        @Deprecated
public boolean setDropBoxAppKeyPair(android.content.Context context,
                                                 java.lang.String appKey,
                                                 java.lang.String appSecret)
        Deprecated. 
        DropBox App key pair must be set to enable "Share Dropbox". You need also to declare Dropbox AuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows, and replace {YourAppKey} with the appKey: <activity android:name="com.dropbox.core.android.AuthActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboard|screenSize|smallestScreenSize|layoutDirection|screenLayout|keyboardHidden|uiMode" android:theme="@style/ZMTheme.SubWindow" android:launchMode="singleTask" > <intent-filter> <!-- Change this to be db- followed by your app key --> <data android:scheme="db-{YourAppKey}" /> <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> Add the following dependency: compile 'com.dropbox.core:dropbox-core-sdk:3.0.5' compile 'com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:3.5.0' You can register your application on DropBox and get your app pair key from: https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        appKey - Dropbox app key
        appSecret - Dropbox app secret
        Returns:
        success or notch

      • setOneDriveClientId

        @Deprecated
public boolean setOneDriveClientId(android.content.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String clientId)
        Deprecated. 
        OneDrive client ID must be set to enable "Share OneDrive". You can register your application on Microsoft OneDrive and get your client ID from: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=193157
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        clientId - OneDrive app client id
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setBoxAppKeyPair

        @Deprecated
public boolean setBoxAppKeyPair(android.content.Context context,
                                             java.lang.String appKey,
                                             java.lang.String appSecret)
        Deprecated. 
        Box App key pair must be set to enable "Share Box". You need also to download Box Android library v2 and Box Java library from https://developers.box.com. Add this libraries to your project's dependency. Declare Box OAuthActivity in the AndroidManifest.xml as follows: <activity android:name="com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities.OAuthActivity" /> You can register your application on Box and get your app key pair from: https://developers.box.com
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        appKey - Box app key
        appSecret - Box app secret
        Returns:
        success or not

      • setGoogleDriveInfo

        @Deprecated
public boolean setGoogleDriveInfo(android.content.Context context,
                                               java.lang.String clientId,
                                               java.lang.String redirectURL)
        Deprecated. 
        Google Drive client ID must be set to enable "Share Google Drive". As Google will no longer allow OAuth requests to Google in embedded browsers known as "web-views", user need to auth google in device browser From: https://developers.googleblog.com/2016/08/modernizing-oauth-interactions-in-native-apps.html To enbale share google drive in meeting, please see section : Enable share with google drive in help doc. You can register your application on Google API console and get your android client ID from: https://code.google.com/apis/console
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use
        clientId - Your android application client id
        redirectURL - Your android application redirect url(Like:com.example.app:/oauth2redirect com.example.app is client id android package name)
        Returns:
        api call success or not

      • getMeetingService

        public MeetingService getMeetingService()
        Get the instance of meeting service.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of MeetingService. Return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.

      • getSmsService

        public SmsService getSmsService()
        Get Sms Service for real name auth for chinese user.
        Returns:
        SmsService SmsService

      • getAccountService

        public AccountService getAccountService()
        Get account service instance.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of account service. It will return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully or the user didn't login.

      • getPreMeetingService

        public PreMeetingService getPreMeetingService()
        Get preMeetingService instance.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of PreMeetingService. It will return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully or the user didn't login.

      • getInMeetingService

        public InMeetingService getInMeetingService()
        Get InMeetingService instance.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of InMeetingService. It will return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.

      • getZoomUIService

        public ZoomUIService getZoomUIService()
        Get ZoomUIService instance.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of ZoomUIService. It will return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.

      • getMeetingSettingsHelper

        public MeetingSettingsHelper getMeetingSettingsHelper()
        Get MeetingSettingsHelper instance.
        Returns:
        The shared instance of MeetingSettingsHelper. It will return null if the SDK has not been initialized successfully.
